alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rockingham and central Hillsborough Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amherst, or near Merrimack, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Exeter, Merrimack, Salem, Bedford, Milford, Amherst, Litchfield, Epping, New Boston, Brentwood, Greenland, Mont Vernon, Mount Vernon, Seabrook, Stratham and Raymond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 93 between mile markers 5 and 22. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough
